#mge

Utena Hiiragi and Minakami Sayo Smooch Prep. Warning this sight may obstruct your view. but who cares anyway, I for sure don't, I will hit my shots regardless.

This is my first sight and I used WTDraw to draw this and export it. I combined this with parts from another sight I don't remember the name anymore.

If anyone has any suggestions for sights for me to do or how to improve this one go ahead and comment.

Hope you enjoy not seeing the battlefield before you.

#wtdraw #hiiragi #hiiragi_utena #magia_baiser #magia #magia_azure #magiaazure #magiabaiser #utena_hiiragi #utena #minakam...
